dcterms:description: A dataset containing reviews and tips from the top 100 reviewers ranked by the number of published reviews and tips. It includes 76,241 reviews and 200,940 sentences from 100 authors.
dcterms:title: Yelp Review Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset of peer reviews collected from NeurIPS (2013-2018) and ICLR (2017) that includes 17,719 reviews and 268,253 sentences, with authorship of reviews being unknown.
dcterms:title: Academic Review Dataset (NeurIPS & ICLR peer reviews)
